mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow (user_id, book_id, borrow_time, due_time, return_time, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{borrowTime}, #{dueTime}, #{returnTime}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, book.title as bookTitle, book.isbn as bookIsbn FROM borrow b LEFT JOIN book ON b.book_id = book.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
SELECT b.*, book.title as bookTitle, u.name as userName FROM borrow b LEFT JOIN book ON b.book_id = book.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
